about: I am a Fullstack Engineer who builds reliable and scalable web applications with strong technical foundations. I focus on core principles such as data design, system structure, and code quality, because I believe solid fundamentals make it easier to adapt to any technology and solve complex problems.

I worked as a Fullstack Engineer at the Information and Communication Technology Academic Support Unit, where I built web applications from scratch, from designing data models and system flows to delivering features that work smoothly on the frontend. My work helped clients reach their goals efficiently and improved their experience with the system.

I aim to build solutions that meet clientsâ€™ needs while also making the codebase easy for my teammates to understand and maintain. I enjoy connecting strong fundamentals with real-world challenges to create practical and well-structured solutions.

experiences.title: Balai Besar Pelatihan Vokasi dan Produktivitas
experiences.role: Generative AI Tools for Digital Content and Business
experiences.description: Leveraged AI tools to accelerate website development, automation, and digital marketing. Built high-performance websites with AI-assisted tools, developed AI-powered chatbots with n8n and PostgreSQL, and created AI-driven marketing content, improving efficiency, scalability, and user engagement.

experiences.title: Unit Penunjang Akademik Teknologi Informasi dan Komunikasi
experiences.description: Built and maintained scalable Laravel applications with secure authentication and full CRUD functionality. Designed optimized PostgreSQL database schemas with migrations and indexing to improve performance and maintainability, delivering reliable and scalable backend solutions.

experiences.title: Bangkit Academy led by Google, Tokopedia, Gojek, and Traveloka
experiences.description: Developed TensorFlow-based machine learning models in the Bangkit program to address environmental challenges. Collaborated on an AI-powered mobile app for waste classification and recommendations, delivering an end-to-end ML solution from data processing to mobile integration.

projects.name: Konco Hiling
projects.description: An integrated travel platform for booking tickets, renting transportation, and exploring tourist destinations through a CMS-powered blog.

projects.name: Inventory Management
projects.description: An inventory management application built with modern web technologies to manage warehouse inventory, track items, process incoming and outgoing goods, handle purchase orders, and control user roles and permissions.

projects.name: Alumni Portal System
projects.description: Developed a web-based alumni portal that collects alumni survey data and provides analytical dashboards to visualize alumni career outcomes, employment status, and industry distribution.

projects.name: Wasteless Eats
projects.description: Wasteless Eats is a platform that redistributes surplus food and reusable goods by connecting donors and sellers with people who need them, reducing waste and supporting sustainable living.

projects.name: Trashify
projects.description: Trashify is a project focused on solving waste disposal problems in Indonesia through innovative waste-to-resource solutions.
